name: Falco peregrinus

description: A fast paced story, set in a brilliantly realised world . . . accompanied by Lady Flint's soldiers whether they are prepared or not.

description: One of the best fantasy novels of recent years' on Sins of Empire

description: The country is in turmoil. With the capital city occupied

description: But escaping war is never easy, and soon the battle may find them

description: Back in the capital, Michel Bravis smuggles even more refugees out of the city.

description: But internal forces are working against him. With enemies on all sides,

description: Michael may be forced to find help with the very occupiers he's trying to undermine.Meanwhile, Ben Styke is building his own army.

name: Macropus robustus

description: My sister was abducted from here nearly thirty years ago. The person who took her was never found.
